title: The Doraemons: Goal! Goal! Goal!!
description: The Doraemons, a group of culturally different versions of the Doraemon, gather to play a game of soccer.

title: Doraemon: Boku no Umareta Hi
description: The Doraemons, a group of culturally different versions of the Doraemon, gather to play a game of soccer.

title: Kiss and Cry
description: The Doraemons, a group of culturally different versions of the Doraemon, gather to play a game of soccer.

title: Natsuiro no Sunadokei
description: Makimura Koutarou has made up his mind: during the summer vacation, he is going to confess his love to the seemingly unapproachable Serizawa Kaho. Yet, on the night before, he has a run-in with a strange girl - an encounter which propels him into the future. There, he learns that not only has Kaho-chan become his girlfriend, but she has also died in a tragic accident. Returning to his own time, Koutarou sets out to change the future and save his love.

title: Jagainu-kun
description: Jagainu-kun and his vegetable friends have adventures in Veggie Town. They go exploring and learn more about themselves and each other. Jagainu-kun and his closest friends often help others in their town with their problems.
